text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today marks the start of our summer<n>camp. To make the
most of our time,<n>we make a beeline for the beach.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Huff, puff... BigBrother, how was my time?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Huff, puff... BigSister, how was my time?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But I haven't reached our goal yet,<n>right? Ugh, I'm so sorry.
It's because<n>I'm no good...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Still, I know what I need to work on.<n>S-so... I just need to
work on it until I<n>get it perfect.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll work on things one step at<n>a time, improve myself
little by little...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'll do whatever it takes... to get<n>faster!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Here I go, Big Brother!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Here I go, Big Sister!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice runs off without showing even a<n>hint of fatigue. As I
watch over her<n>progress, a small figure approaches.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Amazing. She just keeps on trucking.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Ah! S-sorry. Forget that!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The mysterious girl disappears as<n>quickly as she had
arrived...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Whew!
choice_data_list: Nice going, Rice—that was a new record!
Nice going, Rice—that was a new record!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh... R-really?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I-I did it... I really did it!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: It took a ton of time... but I'm happy I<n>did it.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text: You're really something.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Suddenly, the girl from earlier is<n>standing next to Rice
Shower.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Rice, was it? You're incredible... I<n>can't believe you can just
keep going<n>like that.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Incredible? Wait... you mean me?<n>N-not at all! Th-that's not
true!

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Yes it is! You never gave up on<n>running... Meanwhile, I want
to give up<n>as soon as anything goes wrong...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I-I've thought about giving up before<n>too! More times... than
I can count.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I can barely do anything right... I hate<n>seeing myself be so
useless. I can't<n>tell you how many times I almost<n>gave up
out of frustration.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Really? Then... what makes you keep<n>going?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: It's just...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I've figured out... the me I want to be.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text: "The me I want to be?"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Mhm. I want to enter a bunch of<n>races, win a lot, and make
everyone<n>happy. That's the me... I want to be.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: And when I think about that dream, Ican't stop myself. I can't give up—Ihave to run—no, I want to keep running!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
U-um, I'm sorry for not giving you a<n>good answer! I-I'm not
the best at<n>talking—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Wait... Eep?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Splash!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Out of nowhere, a giant wave crashes<n>down, completely
drenching us.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Cough, cough... Ah, I'm so sorry!I mixed you up in my misfortune!

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Cough, cough! Hehe. Hehe,hahaha!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: H-huh? Why are you laughing?

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Haha... My bad. Not sure if it was the<n>wave just now, but
my head feels a<n>lot clearer now.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Thanks, Rice. You helped me<n>remember something
important.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? ...Wha?

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Wanting to be faster, to be stronger... I<n>almost forgot what
that felt like. I can't<n>give up when I haven't achieved my<n>
goals yet, now can I?

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
All right, I'm going for a run! Rice,<n>next time we meet, it'll be
at a race!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
H-how come? It was my fault she got<n>soaked. But then
she... thanked me?<n>Why?
choice_data_list: You gave her the courage to move forward.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I... did? I... W-wa—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: —waaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: By the time I finish comforting Rice,<n>it's dark outside.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... I'm sorry for crying. Iwas just... so happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's the first time, you know. The first<n>time I've cheered
someone up...<n>instead of bringing them misfortune.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mhm! If that's the case... then I'm<n>happy too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: For as long as I can remember, I've<n>always hated myself.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But after today... Maybe I can learn to<n>like myself. Hehehe.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice smiles from ear to ear, her eyes<n>sparkling brighter than
the starry night<n>sky.
